original_text: If anyone says anything to you, say that the Lord needs them, and he will send them right away.”
korean_text: 만일 누가 무슨 말을 하거든 주가 쓰시겠다 하라 그리하면 즉시 보내리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: If anyone says anything to you
say that the Lord needs them
and he will send them right away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그분이 그것들을 즉시 보내실 것이다
